input.sentences: a group of women gathered to cut fruit to sell at the local market .
the man in the household is in charge of organizing all the fruit .
if the fruit is not cut | the consumer can purchase it for a discounted price .
many of the fruits are preserved in adobe shacks .
after the fruits are cut | a local man transports them to the local market to sell via a boat/canoe .
output.sentences: THE MAN WAS STANGING IN THE STORE
